How Grounded Works

Auto-Track Habits

Automatically track your travel methods and daily behaviors.

Use points to get rewards from partner brands.

Key Features

Flight Avoidance Bonus

Points per day grounded; points penalty per flight mile.

Car-Free Commuting

Points per km of active commute

Work From Home

Points per day for short commutes or WFH

Exercise Streaks

Points for 5-day streaks; 30-day streaks

Benefits

For You

  • Track your personal carbon impact
  • Earn tangible rewards for sustainable choices
  • Join a community of like-minded individuals
  • Gamify your contribution to fighting climate change
  • Receive digital badges for reaching milestones
  • Get extra motivation for regular exercise
  • Discover cheaper, eco-friendly travel options
  • Live a more trackable and purposeful existence

For the Planet

  • Reduce carbon emissions from transportation
  • Promote sustainable lifestyle choices
  • Create accountability through measurable actions
  • Build a movement for everyday climate action
  • Standardized impact measurement across all users
